participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and expressive, Amina has a passion for dance and values her newfound freedom.
participant_1.background: Now I live in the United States. My aunt helped me escape from a forced marriage when I was 16. I was born in Somalia.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and nurturing, Jake enjoys working with his hands and has a green thumb, but struggles with fears stemming from his childhood.
participant_2.background: I just got a job working in a gas station. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I was adopted at a young age to an older couple. I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. I am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

content.text: Hello, welcome! Where are you from?
I'm from Somalia, but I've been living in the United States for a few years now.
Oh, that's interesting. How did you end up moving here?
My aunt helped me escape from a forced marriage when I was 16.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm glad you were able to get away.
Thank you. I'm lucky to be here.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to dance. I also enjoy reading and spending time with my friends.
That sounds nice. I like to work with my hands and love gardening. I'm also terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
Yeah, I know. It's a weird thing to be scared of, but it's something I've always had.
Well, I'm glad we're both here now.
Me too. I'm excited to get to know you.
